decision_conditions: The development shall be carried out in accordance with the Proposed Suds Drainage set out in Section 12 of the SustainableDrainage System Strategy hereby approved. Reason: In the interests of flood prevention and to ensure a sustainable drainage system is provided on site.
description: Details required for Condition 9 (Drainage) of planning permission 21/01585/FUL (Erection of new 3 storey building with basement containing 7no. self-contained residential units with ancillary cycle store and refuse/recycling store (following demolition of existing dwellinghouse))
